title: Ep 37: How Estée Lauder Deals with Counterfeit Makeup

description:
Enter the beauty black market with your guide Gregg Marrazzo, Senior Vice President, Deputy General Counsel for the Estée Lauder Companies. But before we crack any crimes, we'll talk about the new "combination hair" type; politics and perfume; and solutions for beard burn.

Become a member at https://plus.acast.com/s/fatmascara.
